attributes.action: Remove children from counting in the 'rule of 6' meeting regulations in England
attributes.additional_details: These are new government regulations, so it is within the government's power to amend them.
attributes.background:
We ask that the regulations in England are changed, removing primary school age children from counting in the 'rule of 6' meeting regulations, as is the case in Scotland and Wales.

The current approach unfairly affects larger families, and prevents many grandparents seeing their grandchildren.
